name: domw-app
description: Demo application for DevOps Midwest 2023. NodeJS Express app that replies with list of files.

scripts.seed: cp ../LICENSE . && mkdir appdata && cd appdata && touch file1.js && touch file2.json && touch file3.java && mkdir subdir && cd subdir && touch data.csv && touch system32.dll && touch staging.conf && cd .. && ls subdir > out.txt && cp ../../LICENSE ./zLICENSE.txt

author: Sketch Development Services
